overview: Released the second Perfume Video Clip collection, "Perfume Clips 2", which contains 16 Video Clips from "Spring of Life" released in 2012 to the latest song "If you wanna" !! First Limited Edition (Blu- Ray and DVD are common), TV-SPOT collection, and all the movie screenings of "Perfume Clips 2" by members are recorded.
title: Perfume Clips 2
